Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hi, i want to invite someone to my organization

To invite someone to your organization, follow these steps:

1. Access Account Management.
2. Click ‘Access’ under your preferred Organization.
3. Select ‘Add User’ on the right-hand side of your screen.
4. Fill in the email address of the new user and their organization role (Admin or Employee) and submit.

Once submitted, the new user will be prompted to make an account via their email. They will then see your organization listed under their own Account Management tab.

For more details, you can refer to our [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide). Let me know if you need further assistance!
